brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts an activity in which you must organize the data blocks into the correct order to show how TDM and STDM uses bandwidth.

Input
Host A: unused, A, unused
Host B: B, B, unused
Host C: C, C, C
Host D: unused, unused, D

Output
TDM:
Insert the output in order to fill all 12 time slices.

STDM:
Insert the output in order to fill all 7 time slices.
